bibl.title: The Derveni Papyrus on Heraclitus.
Tracing Orpheus: Studies of Orphic Fragments In Honour of Alberto Bernabé.

bibl.seg: Burkert Walter, The Derveni Papyrus on Heraclitus (col. IV).

Miguel Herrero de Jáuregui, Ana I. Jiménez San Cristóbal, Eugenio R. Luján, Raquel Martín Hernández, Marco A. Santamaría, Sofía Torallas Tovar (Eds.), Tracing Orpheus: Studies of Orphic Fragments In Honour of Alberto Bernabé = Sozomena. Studies in the Recovery of Ancient Texts. 10 (Berlin - New York, 2011) pp. 361-364.
